testimonials.title: What Our Students Say
testimonials.description: Thousands of students have achieved their IELTS goals with IELTSGo

user1.name: Nguyen Van A
user1.content: Thanks to IELTSGo, I improved my score from 5.5 to 7.5 in just 3 months. The curriculum is very detailed and easy to understand!

user2.name: Tran Thi B
user2.content: This platform helps me practice anytime, anywhere. Diverse exercises and very clear progress tracking.

user3.name: Le Van C
user3.content: High-quality video lessons, teachers explain very clearly. I especially like the skill-based practice section.

exercises.read_instructions_carefully: Read each section's instructions carefully before starting
exercises.manage_time_effectively: Manage time effectively for each section
exercises.save_draft_and_continue: You can save drafts and continue later
exercises.browser_no_audio_support: Your browser does not support the audio element.
exercises.dont_give_up: Don't give up, practice makes perfect
exercises.time_almost_up: Less than 1 minute remaining! Please submit now!
exercises.task_achievement_desc: Fully address all task requirements with clear overview
exercises.task_response_desc: Fully address the question with clear arguments
exercises.coherence_cohesion_desc_task1: Logical organization with effective cohesive devices
exercises.coherence_cohesion_desc_task2: Logical paragraphing with good cohesive devices
exercises.grammatical_range_desc_task2: Complex sentences with few grammatical errors
exercises.writing_task1_description: Task 1 requires describing charts, tables, processes, or maps accurately and in an organized manner.
exercises.writing_task2_description: Task 2 requires writing an essay expressing personal views on a social issue with clear arguments and specific examples.
exercises.speaking_part_1_desc: Answer questions about familiar topics (4-5 minutes)
exercises.speaking_part_2_desc: Speak about a topic for 2 minutes after 1 minute preparation
exercises.speaking_part_3_desc: Discuss abstract issues in depth (4-5 minutes)
exercises.fluency_coherence_desc: Speak fluently and coherently with minimal hesitation
exercises.lexical_resource_speaking_desc: Wide vocabulary range with flexible paraphrasing
exercises.grammatical_range_speaking_desc: Complex sentence structures with few errors
exercises.speaking_tip_part1_1: Answer directly and expand with examples
exercises.speaking_tip_part1_2: Use past tense when talking about experiences
exercises.speaking_tip_part1_3: Avoid short yes/no answers, explain more
exercises.speaking_tip_part2_1: Use the full 1 minute to prepare notes
exercises.speaking_tip_part2_2: Ensure you cover all bullet points
exercises.speaking_tip_part2_3: Speak for the full 2 minutes, don't stop too early
exercises.speaking_tip_part2_4: Use linking words to connect ideas
exercises.speaking_tip_part3_1: Develop ideas with explanations and specific examples
exercises.speaking_tip_part3_2: Use academic vocabulary and complex phrases
exercises.speaking_tip_part3_3: Compare different viewpoints before giving opinion
exercises.speaking_tip_part3_4: Don't be afraid to admit uncertainty and explain why
exercises.audio_note: Audio will be played only ONCE. Focus and take notes of important information.
exercises.academic_purpose_desc: For academic study and research purposes. Academic passages from books and scientific journals.
exercises.general_training_purpose_desc: For work and immigration purposes. More practical passages related to everyday life.
exercises.reading_strategy_skimming: Skim to get main idea (2-3 min/passage)
exercises.reading_strategy_scanning: Scan for specific information in passage
exercises.reading_strategy_context: Don't need 100% vocab, focus on context
exercises.preparation_time_desc: Use this time to prepare ideas for your speech
